file_content.text: Be well, my friend. Take good care of Kira. She's our hero.
Kira? You're here!
And bearing gifts. How's everyone holding up?
Better, now. Can't believe it's really you. A Jedi. You're so different.
Kira's more than a Jedi. She's a hero.
She's been through a lot.
Kira says you destroyed the Emperor. It's a great honor.
You must be Kira's Master. It's an honor.
Different how? A little taller?
Do tell.
More than that. Strong and confident like always, but... happier. At peace.
Everything she is today she owes to me.
I fixed her up.
My Master's humility is renowned across the galaxy. Just ask him.
My Master's humility is renowned across the galaxy. Just ask her.
I still remember that little girl, bundling up in extra layers of clothing. Trying to look bigger and tougher than she was.
Hey, it worked. Add enough layers, and nobody knows who you are.
You were protecting yourself. From what?
You were afraid.
Refugees become victims real easy--but not me.
Kira never talks about her past.
Tell me more, Enaq.
Nothing to tell. Life was hard and then I became a Jedi. But I never forgot my friends.
I bet you looked like a fat Jawa.
I doubt you fooled anyone.
Long as I didn't look like a scared little kid.
Enaq, distribute the food and medicine. Our people have waited long enough. Go now.
This famine... your fault. Our people suffer because of the slaughter you committed in our name. The Ur'kossags.
Who is this man? What's he talking about?
I don't understand.
Name's Darshyn. Been the leader here forever. We have... differences.
Who or what are the Ur'kossags?
Ur'kossags?
A gang. Named themselves after a Huttese word for... you don't want to know.
What dark secret have I uncovered this time?
You let me down again, Kira.
Not a secret. Dark? Depends on your perspective.
Ur'kossags were bad news. Made us their personal entertainment. Robbed, killed and worse--for fun.
I paid the gang a private visit. Asked them nicely to back off. Things got ugly, gangsters died.
You butchered the Ur'kossags. Made a public spectacle of their deaths and spread terror in our name. Everyone fears us.
If what he says is true, you did more than defend yourself.
This isn't good, Kira.
Only thing gangsters understand is big, nasty violence. It worked. They leave my friends alone, now.
You say Kira is responsible for the food and medicine shortage. Why?
How has that hurt you?
Sounds like Kira took care of your gang problem.
At least you're alive.
Blasted right I did. Gangs know not to mess with my friends.
Our reputation frightens away those who could help us--yet desperate people continue to seek refuge here. We can't provide for everyone.
I'll get more supplies to you. I protect my people.
No! Enaq was wrong to bring you back here. Your presence does more harm than good.
Let the refugees take care of themselves, Kira. It's for the best.
He's right.
We must find a way to survive without the threat of violence "protecting" us.
Beggars can't be choosers. Should your people suffer because you're angry with Kira?
Think of the other refugees.
What she did was wrong, but it doesn't mean you should turn away her help.
I'll make it up to you, Darshyn. Promise.
Your promises mean nothing to me.
Maybe the refugees need a new leader. Someone who can show the proper appreciation.
You ungrateful idiot.
How dare you! Is this what Jedi have become? Bullies?
Enough! This isn't what I wanted.
You win, Darshyn. You won't see me again.
Everyone's so excited you're here, Kira. They want to say thanks. Can you stay a while?
Not this time, but I'll be back. Take care of each other until then.
There's a war on, Enaq. Don't know when I'll be back. Take care of yourself, all right?
We are peaceful people. No threat to you.
